import React from 'react' import InfoEdit from "../edits/Information.json" import "../css/information.css" const Information = () => { return (
{InfoEdit.greetTitle}
{InfoEdit.greets.map(text =>

{text}

)}
代表取締役

{InfoEdit.representativeName}

{InfoEdit.overview}
商号
{InfoEdit.companyName}
代表取締役
{InfoEdit.representativeName}
設立
{InfoEdit.established}
資本金
{InfoEdit.capitalStock}
業務内容
{InfoEdit.workContent}
{InfoEdit.historyName}
{ InfoEdit.history.map(data =>
{data.date}
{data.content}
) }
) } export default Information
